API_KEY_ERROR$DESCRIPTION: Your API key appears to be invalid or has insufficient credits. Please check:
API_KEY_ERROR$CHECK_CORRECT_KEY: That you have entered the correct API key from OpenRouter
API_KEY_ERROR$CHECK_CREDITS: That your OpenRouter account has credits if you are using paid models
API_KEY_ERROR$TRY_FREE_MODEL: Try using a free model like Mistral or Llama instead
